articles.author: Deidre McPhillips
articles.title: Flu season continues to intensify in the US, and holiday gatherings could make it worse - CNN
articles.description: Americans gathered for Thanksgiving last week amid a flu season that's worse than any has been in more than a decade, and experts continue to urge caution as multiple respiratory viruses circulate at high levels nationwide.

articles.author: Nick Turner and Mark Gurman
articles.title: ‘Do they hate free speech in America?’ Elon Musk takes aim at Apple - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Elon Musk said that Apple has cut back its advertising on Twitter and even threatened to withhold the social network from its app store, suggesting that a fight is brewing between the two companies.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Gaslighting is Merriam-Webster’s word of the year for 2022 - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: American dictionary calls term ‘a word for our time’ in an age of fake news, misinformation and conspiracy theories.
articles.content:
Gaslighting a word that describes behaviour that manipulates the mind, is misleading and downright deceitful is the Merriam-Webster dictionarys word of the year.
